item.title: Portfolio
item.author: mark@markrichman.com (Mark Richman)
item.description:
• Goal.com

    Goal.com is the world’s largest soccer platform connecting the fans to their passion. Their network of over 500 editors worldwide produces an unrivaled 1000+ articles per day on the local, regional, national, and global level. The quality and volume of content produced has made Goal.com a fixture in the lives of the soccer fan, spectators and players and has led to partnerships with Yahoo! Sports, CNN and to power their (Mobile) soccer coverage. What I did: Created custom Content Management System (CMS) utilizing ASP.NET 3.5, C# 3.0, LINQ, SQL Server 2005, Visual Studio 2008, jQuery, AJAX, Web Services, PHP 5, and MySQL 5.1.

  • ValueWeb

    ValueWeb was one of the world’s most successful web hosting companies, serving over 170,000 businesses since 1996. What I did: Windows based web hosting infrastructure, control panel, and provisioning system using ASP.NET, SQL Server, Windows Communication Foundation (WCF), and SharePoint

    valueweb.com

  • Gate.com

    Gate.com offers Windows based web hosting, targeted at developers and web designers. What I did: Windows based web hosting infrastructure, control panel, and provisioning system using ASP.NET, SQL Server, and WCF gate.com

  • Health Benefits Direct

    Health Benefits Direct specializes in the direct marketing of health and life insurance and related products to individuals and families.What I did: Sales lead distribution system using ASP.NET, SQL Server, and WCF hbdc.com

  • DMR Global

    For nearly 20 years, DMR Global, Inc. has provided recruiting and career consulting services for top executive talent and regional, national, and international organizations in a broad range of industries.What I did: Website design, Search Engine Optimization (SEO), and Search Engine Marketing (SEM)dmrglobal.com

  • Mobelform

    Leading provider of high-end European furniture, Mobelform represents more than 40 beautifully executed European lines and offers one-on-one personalized service to hundreds of the top designers in the U.S., Latin America and Caribbean regions.What I did: Online product catalog development.mobelform.com 

                      <p>
                        …and dozens more successful projects than I can comfortably squeeze on one page.
                      </p>

                      <p>
                        Talk to me about your idea, and I might be able to point you to projects in my portfolio that would particularly interest you.
                      </p>
